name: Gavin Glick
note:
Gavin. Israel. Thunda helps companies achieve exponential growth by harnessing the power of Facebook’s marketing platform. Their main goal is doing campaigns( FB, email, video). Now they are looking for somebody who can help with the design ( to create posts for different social posts) for email campaigns on full time basis with knowledge of English . We told him all about our services, pricing. He need time to discuss in with his partner and let us know, what they decide.  I send him SV's and all additioanal information by email. Gavin decided to take Marta Vereteno for part time.

Компания занимается печатью фото на спрессованном PVS, лазерной печатью

client_accounting_note.note:
15.06.23
Діяльність компанії - створюють рекламний контент у вигляді анімаційних зображень, відео; героїв ігор;комікси; редагують відео. У СРМ -helps companies achieve exponential growth by harnessing the power of Facebook’s marketing platform. Their main goal is doing campaigns( FB, email, video). Сайт у гуглі: http://storyboardsinc.com/home   Пошта: був лист на запит ще одного працівника ""Just wanted to say we are happy with Martha.
We are having a lot of orders and wanted to know if there was someone to help us with simple photo editing and cropping for another 4 hours evenry morning.Thanks"" але через два тижні надіслав ""We have had quite a reduction, and we do not need Natalia services for so many hours. Is it possible to reduce the hours, if not we need to cancel ger services."" і на цьому вона припинила працювати.  Оплата 1-2 тижні.

name: Martin Reznicek
note:
Updated
We are going to discuss options for partnership in managing human resources for GCO Medienagentur in Ukraine. 

Website: rh-s.com

Company website: https://gco-agentur.de

Comments: Martin Reznicek  

(https://www.linkedin.com/in/martin-reznicek-628798ba/)

The lead is interested in graphic designers and content managers who speak German, I said that there are none, but asked if an English-speaking employee who would work with a translator would be suitable for them. He said you can try.

Manager: Korzhova Liudmyla

name: Academic Studies Press
note: Yes that should work - could do 11 or 12 (UK time)

need_candidates.comment_requirements:
Acquisitions Assistant 

Responsibilities include:

- Assisting the acquisitions team in acquiring new manuscripts and developing new series: extensive market research for opportunities in several academic fields, contacting potential authors 
- Keeping uptodate identify trends in relevant fields of research and academic publishing in general 
- Preparing P&Ls and ensuring financial viability of projects
- Assessing submitted manuscripts for quality and completeness 
- researching grant opportunities and preparing applications together with the rest of the team
- Representing the press at events and conferences in person and online
- manage correspondence with authors and other departments 

Candidate specifications :

- Experience in academic and publishing fields desirable
- Experience working in an international setting (English-speaking)
- A relevant degree in the humanities, social sciences, or publishing
- Business-level written and spoken English 
- Market research experience
- Comfortable working under pressure, meeting strict deadlines and targets
- Comfortable communicating at all levels and in an international environment
- Business acumen and experience in assessing financial viability desirable


Publishing Assistant 

Responsibilities include:

- Following all pre-production stages of contracted books, from contract signature to production, ensuring timelines are kept, working closely with the editorial team and other teams within the company
- preparing contract paperwork and invoices 
- Assessing submitted manuscripts for quality and completeness, and arranging their peer review, liaising with series editors (where relevant)
- finding and assigning peer reviewers, managing peer review process for all manuscripts 
- manage correspondence with authors and other departments 

Candidate specifications :

- Experience working in an international setting (English-speaking)
- excellent time and deadline management skills 
- Business written and spoken English 
- Comfortable working under pressure, meeting strict deadlines and targets, and enforcing them 
- Comfortable working on a variety of tasks at the same time 
- A relevant degree in the humanities or social sciences or publishing an advantage 
- Experience in academic and publishing field desirable
- chasing team members and authors based on deadlines 

---
FOR BOTH JOBS:

Remote.
Part time, flexible. Over 50% up to full time would be a combination of the two posts (Acquisitions/Publishing Assistant)
Salary is the same for both, $1,000 USD pm full time (or pro rata)
Both are suitable for fast track to Acquisitions Associate for the right candidate (training provided). 
Start date ASAP.
